humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the following information: pSNO (0/2). This indicates that 0 out of 2 assessed lymph nodes were positive for metastatic carcinoma. Based on the new rules provided, N0 can indicate no metastatic carcinoma in sentinel lymph nodes and regional lymph nodes (New Rule 10) or that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma (New Rule 11). Therefore, the pathologic N stage for this patient's cancer is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The pathology report does not mention any involvement of regional lymph nodes (N0) by the cancer. The report states 'without any evidence of invasion of the lymph vessels' and there is no mention of positive lymph nodes or extranodal extension. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.
